Place 2 - Sharron Rogers
========================

Email:
[Sharron Rogers](mailto:Sharronr@grapevinetexas.gov "Sharron Rogers")
City Council
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Sharon Round 2-201-229 (1)](https://www.grapevinetexas.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=7098)

* City Council Facilities Committee
* City Council Utility Committee
* Crime Control and Prevention District Board of Directors

* Chamber of Commerce, member
* Womenâ€™s Division of the Chamber of Commerce, member
* Grapevine Heritage Foundation, charter member
* Baylor Hospital Development Council, past member

* National Society, Daughters of the American Revolution (Captain Molly Corbin Chapter), Community Service Award recipient

* Grapevine resident since 1975
* Retired from American Airlines after 21 years of service
* Past Vice President for Spencer Engineering, Inc.

* [Report
  An Issue](https://www.grapevinetexas.gov/389)
